author: kpedro88
body: This PR applies a small patch to protobuf so that text output from the `text_format` Python API avoids repetition for both primitive types and message types. This is used to get more concise printouts from the `cmsTritonConfigTool` (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43695 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43696).
title: Improve protobuf text_format output
